features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Complete authentication system with login, signup, password reset for both guests and hosts

features.name: Villa Search and Discovery
features.description: Homepage with search functionality, featured villas, and popular destinations

features.name: Booking System
features.description: Complete booking flow from villa selection to confirmation and payment

features.name: Guest Dashboard
features.description: Guest user dashboard with trip management and profile editing

features.name: Host Management
features.description: Host dashboard, villa management, onboarding wizard, and reservations

features.name: Messaging System
features.description: Real-time messaging between guests and hosts with thread management

features.name: Review System
features.description: Guest and host review functionality with editing capabilities

features.name: Wishlist Management
features.description: Save and manage favorite villas in wishlists

features.name: Navigation and Layout
features.description: Responsive navigation with search, user menus, and footer

features.name: State Management
features.description: Global application state with Zustand including user session, search, messaging, and booking cart

key_components.real_time: Socket.io for live messaging and notifications
key_components.build_tool: Vite for fast development and building

architecture_patterns: Error boundary pattern for error handling
